snippet: The Donald Trump media operation, which has dominated the political conversation so far, faces a bigger challenge in the general election.
abstract: Jim Rutenberg Mediator column contends Donald J Trump's presidential campaign, which has dominated ratings and attention throughout new-media landscape, is in fact media campaign that should be called Trump Productions Inc, rather than being labeled presidential; wonders whether efficacy of campaign will continue as presidential election nears, or if Trump's approach will end up serving Hillary Rodham Clinton well.
lead_paragraph: The Donald Trump media operation, which has dominated the political conversation so far, faces a bigger challenge in the general election.

headline.print_headline: Trump Show, a Hit for Now, Faces Fall Test
headline.main: The Trump Show, a Hit for Now, Faces a Test in the Fall
